overview: A peculiar road-movie on the times of quarantine through the eyes of a 14-year-old girl in upstate New York. A static, black and white, provincial landscape, full of emptiness, animal farms and a lonely car racing the empty streets. In a world that once was at a constant fight, the things that used to be considered important now seem so strange. The one and only thing that still exists is the gravity; things do not fall apart.
title: Fighting World
